title: How to Use a Biscuit Joiner: Tips and Techniques

steps.title: Align the pieces of wood you want to join.
steps.content: Align the pieces of wood you want to join.

steps.title: Make marks at the places where biscuits will be placed.
steps.content: Make marks at the places where biscuits will be placed. Use as many biscuits as needed to secure the pieces of wood.

steps.title: Mark the other piece of wood at the same locations.
steps.content: Mark the other piece of wood at the same locations. The biscuit process allows some leeway in aligning the pieces of wood, so perfect alignment is unnecessary.

steps.title: Use the settings and stops on the biscuit joiner to set the depth of the cut.
steps.content: Use the settings and stops on the biscuit joiner to set the depth of the cut.

steps.title: Place the joiner firmly on the pencil markings.
steps.content: Place the joiner firmly on the pencil markings.

steps.title: Turn on the joiner and push it forward to cut a crescent shape into the wood.
steps.content: Turn on the joiner and push it forward to cut a crescent shape into the wood. Apply pressure to release the blade, allowing it to cut the wood. The joiner's cutting blade will retract while it is idle. The crescent shaped slots may be longer and larger the joiner biscuit; this allows a user to better align the joined pieces just before the glued joiner biscuit starts to set.

steps.title: Cut slots at each location on each piece of wood.
steps.content: Cut slots at each location on each piece of wood.

steps.title: Cover each biscuit with wet wood glue or apply glue inside the slots.
steps.content: Cover each biscuit with wet wood glue or apply glue inside the slots.

steps.title: Slip a biscuit into each one of the slots at each location.
steps.content: Slip a biscuit into each one of the slots at each location.

steps.title: Clamp the two pieces of wood firmly with wood clamps.
steps.content: Clamp the two pieces of wood firmly with wood clamps. Upon being clamped, the compressed biscuit will expand to fill the crescent shaped slot and create a strong bond between the two pieces as it dries.

steps.title: Wipe away any excess glue before it dries.
steps.content: Wipe away any excess glue before it dries.

steps.title: Clean the joiner according to product directions before storing when not in use.
steps.content: Clean the joiner according to product directions before storing when not in use.
